entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm except 15 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 18 except 10 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 18 except 10 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
